moves.name: Ember
moves.effect: Has a very small chance of leaving the target burned.

moves.name: Hang in There!
moves.effect: Raises the user’s Defense and Sp. Def. Makes the user gradually heal itself.

moves.name: Fire Fang
moves.effect: Has a very small chance of making the target flinch. Has a very small chance of leaving the target burned.

passives.name: Hostile Environment 1
passives.description: Raises the chance of inflicting status conditions with the additional effects of moves.

passives.name: Dirty Fighting 1
passives.description: Powers up moves when the move’s target or targets are affected by a status condition.
